Generating code in M4: fundamentals

# number of characters in perex (200 ±10 is recommended): 203
18
The M4 macro processor is used to generate arbitrarily complex code from simple source code. This part is focused on explanation of necessary, seemingly complex concepts of theoretical computer science.
